imdb.plot outline: Stephanie, a crazy ass b****, suffers from Paranoid schizophrenia. Stephanies mind is controlled by an inner demon that advises her to treat Mick, her boyfriend of 3 years, like a piece of meat. Mick, her long time boyfriend is no match for Stephanies inner voices and will basically do anything to make the love if his life happy no matter how painful it is for him. Good luck Mick!
imdb.title: Diary of a Crazy Ass Bitch
akas: Diary of a Crazy Ass Bitch (United States)
plot: Poor Mick is stuck with a crazy girlfriend with little hope of survival. There's no light at the end of this dead end tunnel.::Anonymous
